About US

Arif & CO Chartered Accountants.

Our firm’s main objective is to provide professional and effective consultancy in the field of financial advisory, taxation, corporate matters, audit and related fields. We also want to empower the youth and aim to provide employment, equip the youth with entrepreneurship skills and develop the nation’s work force. Our firm has made significant strides in growing its market share and the staff complement.

More about US

WHO WE ARE

Arif & Co is one of Pakistan’s best firm in the field of Audit, Tax, Advisory and Management Consultancy.

LEARN MORE

WHAT WE DO

Audit & Assurance Taxation Services Accounting Services.

LEARN MORE

WHERE WE WORK

Our firm’s is registered with Institute of Chartered Accountants of Pakistan (ICAP) with its registered office in Rawalpindi

LEARN MORE

OUR MISSION

We have a passion for what we do – and we believe you will see this in our services and our team.

WHAT WE VALUE

We follow the philosophy of a personal service and are committed to develop a close relationship with our clients, which enable us to understand the challenges and issues faced by them in financial and corporate matters; an area in which we have vast experience and expertise.

QUALITY ASSURANCE

The Firm renders its services to a vast range of clients from public, private, government, semi-government sectors and multinational corporations all over the Pakistan.

LOCAL KNOWLEDGE

The Firm renders its services to a vast range of clients from public, private, government, semi-government sectors and multinational corporations all over the Pakistan.

We don’t just promise, we do the work!

Why Us

Reason To Choose Arif & CO.

We build ‘Trust and Relationships’, and have been continuing this for over 15 years. Continuous Value Addition to clients is our motto. We are partners in your growth. We don’t work FOR our clients, we work with them. Our major emphasis is on understanding the clients business needs and formulating their solutions, and this is the reason why we are the best CA firms in Islamabad.:
